SELECT u.login_id AS loginId, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email, u.user_role AS userRole, p.user_name AS professorName, s.status AS status, s.grade AS grade, latest_course.semester AS semester, latest_course.year AS year, d.dept_name AS deptName,
( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(c.credit), 0) FROM enrollment e JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.user_id = s.user_id AND e.rank != 'F' ) AS totalCredits
FROM student s JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN professor pf ON s.dept_id = pf.dept_id LEFT JOIN user p ON pf.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN department d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c1.user_id, c1.semester, c1.year FROM course c1 JOIN ( SELECT user_id, MAX(year) AS max_year FROM course GROUP BY user_id ) c2 ON c1.user_id = c2.user_id AND c1.year = c2.max_year JOIN ( SELECT user_id, year, MAX(semester) AS max_semester FROM course GROUP BY user_id, year ) c3 ON c1.user_id = c3.user_id AND c1.year = c3.year AND c1.semester = c3.max_semester ) latest_course ON latest_course.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.login_id = #{userId} ORDER BY pf.user_id LIMIT 1
